alexcrichton commented on issue #5218:

I've posted CI fixes to https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/5219 and otherwise this is going to be merged this Thursday with the upcoming security patch release.

alexcrichton commented on issue #5218:

I've added release notes here for 2.0.2 and will merge/publish once CI is green to confirm the fixes still pass all tests.
